title: Terry Gross Interviews Seth Meyers | Trump Under Investigation: A Closer Look | Patty Jenkins
description:
On today's show, you'll hear an excerpt from Seth's interview with Terry Gross live in Philadelphia that helped commemorate 30 years of Fresh Air with Terry Gross. You can listen to their full interview on the Fresh Air podcast or right here: http://www.npr.org/2017/06/14/532861051/for-our-30th-anniversary-fresh-air-tapes-live-with-seth-meyers-of-late-night
Then, Seth takes a closer look at reports that President Trump is personally under investigation for obstruction of justice as Senate Republicans edge closer to passing a secret health care bill.
After that, Patty Jenkins chats with Seth about directing blockbuster Wonder Woman and what kids think about about the superhero lead being a girl. She also takes a few more questions backstage with Late Night producer Henry Melcher.
LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
